Details: Traditional waste collection relies on fixed schedules and manual planning, leading to overflowing bins, unnecessary collections, excessive fuel consumption, higher operational costs, and negative environmental impact.
EcoPulse is an AI-driven smart waste management platform that monitors real-time waste levels, predicts future demand, and dynamically optimizes collection schedules and routes.
End-to-end solution including IoT-enabled waste sensors, AI forecasting models, dynamic truck routing algorithms, and a centralized analytics dashboard for municipalities and facility managers.
B2B SaaS subscription model with tiered pricing based on number of bins, analytics depth, and support level, complemented by long-term enterprise and municipal service contracts.
Advanced AI-based waste prediction; dynamic route optimization; real-time operational insights; scalable cloud-native infrastructure; sustainability and carbon-impact tracking for ESG reporting.

Functional MVP completed; pilot deployments prepared with residential compounds and university campuses; initial sensor field tests show accurate fill-level prediction and routing efficiency improvements.
2025: Commercial pilots and first municipal contracts; 2026: Expansion across MENA smart cities; 2027: Integration of carbon credits, ESG reporting automation, and regional expansion beyond MENA.
Product Lead with smart city experience, AI/ML Engineer, IoT Systems Engineer, Operations Manager, and Business Development Lead with government contracting expertise.
$250k pre-seed funding to deploy 1,500 smart bins, secure 5 enterprise or municipal clients, reach $180k ARR, and demonstrate measurable cost and emission reductions within 12 months.
